column5: The Masters in Management programme delivers a strong academic and practical grounding in core subjects. This includes strategy, marketing, finance and ethics, as well as offering you a wide choice of elective modules. Your studies will conclude with two capstone modules: an international study visit and an applied management project. These will allow you to start applying your learning in real-world situations and putting your skills and knowledge into practice.On this postgraduate course, you'll join students from across the globe and prepare for an outstanding career in management and
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
